name: AgileFacts
0:
”Alexa, Open Agile Facts”
”Alexa, Launch Agile Facts”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: agile facts
des:
v 2.0: The skill is enabled with Alexa Presentation Language (APL) to view on multi-modal devices. Now enjoy reading the fact on a screen while listening to it. Also you can ask for next fact or another fact, till you browse through the complete library. 
v 1.0: Ask for an Agile fact to Alexa to learn a bit today. A collection of facts from all the Agile Project Management Methodologies. Keep visiting and listen to a new fact daily. This is for voice only devices.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
